name: commercetools-nodejs-boilerplate
description: Generic Boilerplate for bootstrapping NodeJS applications

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d lib
scripts.test: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test babel-node test/*.spec.js test/*/**spec.js | tap-spec
scripts.coverage: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test babel-node ./node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --cmd test/* --include src/*
scripts.coverage:html: cross-env NODE_ENV=test babel-node ./node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --cmd test/* --include src/* --report html

author: Abimbola Idowu <abimbola.idowu@commercetools.de> (https://github.com/hisabimbola)
